alert.note: Alert for Central Horry; Florence; Marion; Northern Horry; Williamsburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 5:43PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Florence, northwestern Horry, Marion and northeastern Williamsburg Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 542 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Galivants Ferry to 6 miles east of Cades. Movement was northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Horry, Loris, Johnsonville, Hemingway, Galivants Ferry, Hannah, Poston, Brittons Neck, Indiantown, Gresham, Bayboro, Allsbrook, Green Sea, Kingsburg, Aynor, and Stuckey. This includes SC Highway 22 between mile markers 1 and 8. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Central Horry; Florence; Marion; Northern Horry; Williamsburg
